name: ticketforge
description: TicketForge - Open Source Help Desk Solution

scripts.version:sync: node -e "const v=require('./package.json').version; const fs=require('fs'); ['frontend','backend'].forEach(d=>{const p=d+'/package.json';const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p));pkg.version=v;fs.writeFileSync(p,JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\n');}); console.log('Synced version '+v+' to frontend and backend');"
